body.p: The following table list a high level overview of the OpenStack projects/services which are included in HP Helion OpenStack and their status. Only official upstream OpenStack projects are included, not non-OpenStack add-ons that originate elsewhere. If the service is not listed in the table then it is not present in HP Helion OpenStack.

section.title: Relation of HOS OpenStack Services to OpenStack stable/kilo

body.p: The general policy for HOS 2.0 is that each service is kept up to date versus upstream OpenStack stable/kilo. Automated jobs run nightly to mirror upstream OpenStack stable/kilo down to HOS's internal code mirror so, unless the sync job fails, each service should be up to date. The level of drift between upstream OpenStack stable/kilo and what is included in the HOS V2.0 build is summarised here. This is automated output from all the OpenStack repos included in the HOS daily builds. Note that Ceilometer, Nova, Horizon, Keystone and Cinder have >2 local patches.The detailed list of all missing patches and all local patches is here. OpenStack Kilo Stable Patch Release ScheduleThe schedule for patch releases for OpenStack Kilo is at Planned stable/kilo releases (9 months). Note that 2015.1.1 released in July and 2015.1.2 is due in mid-Sept. What 'version' of OpenStack Kilo will HOS V2.0 ship with?As per above, HOS V2.0 is built from code which is sync'd nightly with upstream OpenStack stable/kilo. HOS V2.0 will therefore ship with the latest Kilo patches as of the final build of HOS V2.0. In other words, the HOS V2.0 plan is that it will be more up to date than the 2015.1.2 "Kilo patch release".
